segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookies, and I’m surprised he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely missing the whole scene, and it’s amazing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring everywhere, and I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like the whole scene is just a little bit magical in its chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, and it’s a nice contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised the boy hasn’t gotten caught yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s straight out of a storybook.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s apron is probably soaked by now, and she doesn’t even know it.
segments.speaker: PAR
